about:
Hello!
  I am very romantic, my design is feminine, floral and playful. I love watercolor and hand-drawn illustrations.
  I have a bachelor degree in graphic design. I have a lot of experience in working with different organizations, companies and teams which resulted in professional and excellent results.
  I am open for work and 1to1 projects!
  I’m happy to create a unique identity for you! :)

about: I'm a young graphic designer who has worked in graphic content creation, logo design, and brand identity systems for about 10 years. I am the owner of a small branding and graphic design agency focused on providing small businesses and start ups with the brand strategy and graphic assets at an affordable price range so that they are better equipped to compete with larger, well established brands in their market space. My design aesthetic would best be described as simple, modern, and timeless.

about: Hello world
tags: ['Logo design']

about:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my page.
  I specialize in logo design. I strive for simplicity and minimalism in my design style. At the same time, I try to express the essence of your company in my logos. My catchy logos are simple in the perception and can lead your business to success.
  If you need the logo design done, feel free to contact me.

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.

about: I studied a Diploma in Graphic Design immediately after finishing high school in 2011. From there I started with a design agency where I focused primarily on poster design for a large volume of hospitality venues, as well as marketing material for corporate banks such as St George and Westpac. I've since ventured out on my own and found a new passion in logo design. I'm constantly finding new ways to develop and improve my skills everyday.

about: Let me take a moment to introduce myself to you. I've been a freelance illustrator and artist for the past 38 years, with hundreds of my designs appearing on or in clothing, coloring books, posters, greeting cards, children’s picture books, and animal collections on canvas. I have created everything from cartoons to realistic drawings, of animals and children. To see more of my work, please visit https://debbiegrayillustrator.myportfolio.com!

about:
Thanks for stopping by to my design portfolio. I am a designer, specifically the logo design with a unique design, intelligent visual images to present business and client needs. I try to make designs that work well in all colors and media (web and print needs).
  Of course I also provide services for business card design, email signatures, banners etc.

about: Hi, I'm Amit kumar. I have 6+ years experience in creating logo & Graphic designs from start ups to large companies. I love designing logos, Graphic designs and other branding material. I provide custom designs, high work ethic and client satisfaction. I work on one project at a time and I give 100% of my personal attention to the project I'm working on. Quality for me is not just "conformance to requirement".

  I create art that allows me to feel free, to discover myself, to express my opinion, to transmit love.
  My skills extend from graphic creation (posters - visual identities - logos ...) and digital illustration to User experience .
  I master the Adobe suite (Photoshop, XD, Illustrator, PremiÃ¨re ..etc.)
  I like to explore alternative solutions to problems and I have an open mind about what will work best.

about: I'm a graphic designer, illustrator and teacher, with more than 20 years of experience. My focus is on logo design, corporate identity and branding, working for many big brand names as well as smaller companies, organizations and start-ups, to produce high-quality design that not only looks great, but effectively does the job it is indented to do. Please contact me for 1-to-1 projects if you like my work.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: Hello! My name is Tara, and I am a veteran graphic designer of 11 years and a certified Adobe Illustrator master. I specialize in branding, logo, and social media design with a focus on vector artwork. I am competent in a wide variety of styles, but bespoke freehand logo designs watercolor embellishments and a feminine flair are my specialty.

  I'm experienced with branding, packaging, advertising, book cover, illustration and more.

', 'Life is GRAND to me because of my grand babies. Daniela understood what I was looking for was wonderful to work with. I love my picture!']
